import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./SignIn.modulus.css" import { auth } from "../../../firebase" import { signInWithEmailAndPassword } from 'firebase/auth' import signInImg from "../../../images/signIn.jpg" const SignIn = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const signIn = (e) => { e.preventDefault() signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password) .then((userCredential) => { console.log(userCredential) }).catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } return (

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
